inn1.comm: pitched up, on the stumps, some swing in to the left hander, who drives it nicely to mid on
good length now, slanted across, comes on neatly, Kusal pushes to extra cover
starts way outside leg and sends it further down with the movement, Saha getting some early exercise
137.3 kph and short, but Kusal has fetched it casually from off stump line and swung it flat in the air in front of square
moves forward to a good length ball and pushes to extra cover
he's been making them come in, this one jags across the left hander from short of a length, beating him outside off
that is a ripper, that has hit the pitch on short of a length and climbed and moved away past Perera at 139.2 kph, taking a thin edge through to Saha, he had to play at that line just outside off
gets it to hold the line on a good length on off, Dilshan defends on to pad off a thick inside edge
again Kulkarni makes it straighten just outside off, this one bounces too, Dilshan defends tightly
almost went through him, was pitched much fuller this time, Dilshan had a go at it, and managed a thick inside edge through square leg
132 kph and nice carry through to the keeper as Dilshan leaves an outswinger just outside off
top start from Kulkarni this, another one just outside off, bouncing from good length, slight away movement, Dilshan defends solidly
stays inches outside off with a short of a length ball, Dilshan tries to cut but the width is just not there, chops it towards point

they have the big wicket first ball, Yadav is celebrating with a jump, not as tight a line as the one that claimed Kusal, but Sangakkara prods at one leaving him and bouncing sharply from short of a good length, and the edge is snapped up by Ashwin at first slip
calmly lets the short of a length ball come on and defends from the crease
moving away and climbing outside off, left alone
what a start this from Yadav, 138 kph plus lifter comes into Mahela around shoulder height, and he is hopping in the air and fending it with one hand
an away swinging full toss arrives now and Dilshan puts it away between bowler and mid off
short and wide, Dilshan tries to get on top of the bounce and whack it through covers, but hits it to short cover on the bounce
pitched up away swinger just outside off, Mahela stands on the crease, lets it arrive and dead-bats it
he is looking to play from the crease, good length ball straightens on off, he opens up in the crease and blocks
ending on middle this time with some more angle into the batsman, nudged to the leg side
lots of width, but not enough power and no placement on the shot from Mahela as he finds point
135.9 kph but banged short down the leg side from Kulkarni this time
goes back to the line just outside off, slight away shape, good length, Mahela defends back to the bowler
he was looking to avoid this short ball initially as he swayed inside the line, but as it arrived he guided it well over the reach of the keeper
run out chance, but Rayudu misses at the non-striker's end from extra cover, Mahela would have been gone, he had run too far up the pitch
shot!, leg sidish length ball from Yadav, and Dilshan has powered it just to the left of the square leg umpire with lots of wrist, and a flourish of a followthrough
around yorker length wide outside off, Dilshan tries to reach it, misses
wide and swinging away, Dilshan goes hard at it, and the thick edge flies to the third man boundary, fielder quite square in that region, no chance
wanted to heave this 139 kph short of a length ball away, but missed and was hit on the body
a length ball on off stump, Mahela nudges it in front of Ishant at mid on for a single
wants to slam this length ball through covers, but mishits it, the ball rolls to extra cover
comes forward and squeezes a length ball to the off side, Raina dives at short extra and takes pace off it
nicely forward to push to short extra cover
back of a length, middle stumpish line, and DIlshan punishes it with a whip in the air through square leg
ends the over with a length ball just outside off stump, pushed to short extra cover
very full on the stumps, slight angle into the right hander, who awkwardly plays it to mid on
thick inside edge to fine leg as Mahela pushes at a short of a length ball around off
plenty of width, short of a length, but Dilshan cannot time it as he goes too hard after it
beaten as he pushes from the crease at a short of a length ball leaving him
again, Dilshan has the width but cannot find timing as he hits one to covers
just outside off from short of a length to end the over, pushed away
back of a length, tight line, nudged towards the sip cordon
133.9 kph and angled in from back of a length, he tries to tap it and run, but a fielder is close by
flashes a widish delivery to point
he is being kept quiet with this short of a good length angled in close to off stump, softly pushes another one away
opens the face and runs a length delivery for second slip to run forward and stop it
no fine leg, Dhawan runs across from deep square and dives in vain, and signals four as he gets up, wasn't really down the pads but Mahela used the angle to work it fine
in the air down to square third man as he goes after a pitched up away swinger
138.3 kph length delivery defended to the off side
escapes as this leading edge flies down to third man, wanted to work this length ball on middle to leg, but it swung away
fuller on middle stump, and Dilshan turns it through midwicket, not with much timing
overpitched outside off, but he's steered it straight to point
short and wide, he waits and dabs it past point, it seems to be slipping away from Kulkarni running across from third man, but he keeps it in with a clumsy drive
wants to cut a short of a length ball but is cramped by the incoming angle
now he is hit on the thigh pad with a 135.6 kph short of a length ball
ending on off stump with the incoming angle, played out to mid on
pitched up now, and Dilshan slams it straight back to the bowler
tight line inches outside off with a length ball and it is pushed away to point
could have played on as he tried to make some room to one that was angled in sharply from short of a length
opens the face on a 126 kph length ball and runs it to third man
length ball pushed to mid on, Yadav comes in and prevents the single
Akshar runs to his right and dives at square leg to keep a thick inside edge from Dilshan to one
128.1 kph and down the pads, Mahela flicks it languidly in the air over square leg, they have taken two, but umpire Oxenford reckons Mahela has run one short, didn't seem to be really
solidly pushes a good length ball around off
another tight push to the off side
lets this one go as it bounces outside off stump
right on off stump line from a good length, defended down the pitch
down to third man for a single
just short of Saha diving to his right as Ishant produces the edge with a short of a length ball that holds its line
length ball worked through square leg
Kulkarni escapes as Dilshan fails to connect off his pads, but they steal a leg bye
just short of a length, right on off stump, defended from the crease
middle and leg line, good length, turned softly to midwicket
130.9 kph, short, angled down the leg side, barely above waist height, and DIlshan punishes it as he helps it along to the fine leg rope
lunges forward and works it wide of mid on, Yadav fails to pick it up on the run, and concedes another one
wants to hammer this overpitched ball out of sight, but mistimes it, and it rolls to mid off
what a strike, Mahela has taken a step out, and used Ishant's angle to lift this length ball cleanly over midwicket
shortens the length a bit, keeps the line just outside off, Mahela defends
Mahela is confident about the single as he opens the face and runs it behind point, but Dilshan is hesitant, the fielder can't get to the ball in time, and the run is on
pitched up and angled in to off, Dilshan leans forward and turns it to deep square
overpitched on middle and leg, turned softly, to deep square
gets on his toes and works a short of a length ball in front of square leg, Dhawan runs in from the deep and keeps them to one
Kulkarni has got away with another one down the pads, as Dilshan cannot make use of it, ball rolls to the keeper
length ball worked to vacant midwicket for a single
length ball on off and middle, tapped to midwicket
no room again with this length ball, he works it to the leg side
opens the face and runs a length ball past Ashwin's dive at gully
slower bouncer outside off stump. Dilshan waits and drags it through midwicket
tossed up just outside off, pushed to long off
pushes a full delivery, Akshar skips to his left and stops it
comes down the track, Akshar shortens the length, and Dilshan pads it away
pushed down the track to the bowler, did not turn and took the inside part of the bat
and again, Dilshan playing for some turn, this hits the inside edge and races to short fine leg
lunges right forward and smothers this one
pitched up offbreak pushed down to long on
good length offbreak, he waits for it to turn in and runs it past slip
could have worked it straight to midwicket, went to him on the bounce
much flatter ball into the pad, paddled to short fine leg
leans across and works an offbreak to square leg
taps it to point for a single
eases a tossed up ball wide of the sweeper, Rayudu runs to his right and allows just one
that has been slashed over slip, Dilshan went hard at this wide ball, and it flew over Raina, was at catchable height, but too fast
pushed down to long off
moves across to one on the pad and works it softly past short fine leg, Yadav runs after it and hauls it in with a dive close to the rope
plays it from the crease as it comes on around off
flatter one on off, tapped to midwicket
not much turn on length outside off, MJ taps it towards point softly for one
flighted delivery on length outside off, pushed off the front foot to cover
shorter delivery with sharp turn towards the stumps, cut late to short third man off the inside edge
flatter and fuller outside off, tucked straight to midwicket
comes down the track and defends it with the turn to short fine leg
bit of flight towards the stumps, pushed down towards mid-on past a diving Ashwin for one
angled in towards the pads from off, takes on the pads on the back foot
bit of flight and turn outside of, helped to wide slip
fuller towards the stumps, flicked to midwicket
slower and angled towards the stumps, tucked to square leg for one
length delivery tapped softly towards cover point, MJ wants one but is sent back
fullish outside off, pushed straight to cover
full delivery pushed down to long on
another single down to long on, from a full offbreak outside off
nearly 96 kph and down the leg side, Dilshan sweeps but short fine stops it with a dive
moves across and taps to midwicket with the spin
90.8 kph, fullish just outside off, pushed to midwicket
lunges forward and works it to square leg
goes back to a shorter ball but it comes on quickly and he taps it to midwicket
super shot, it is not easy to play this against the angle and pace Akshar is bowling at, this was on middle stump too, but Mahela has gone back and cut it far behind point
skips out and pushes it away off pad
width outside off, he slaps it past point to the sweeper
offbreak turned from off stump line to deep midwicket
overpitched just outside off, turned to long on
leans forward and pushes neatly to long on
he's charged out to a tossed up widish ball and lofted it over extra cover, not off the middle, but enough to beat Rahane's slide to the rope, that is fifty too for Dilshan
big stride out to smother it down the track
forced to midwicket where Kohli stops it to his left
straight length ball outside off forced to cover
width given and Mahela uses it to cut in the gap between short third man and point, it almost reaches the rope before Yadav pulls it back in
shortish and not rising much, Dilshan mistimes the pull to deep square leg
leg stump line, Mahela works it behind square and is not happy that Dilshan turned down the single
works it to deep square leg, and no confusion over the single this time
worked off the front foot to backward square leg
tapped square on leg for one
overpitched on the pad and Mahela gets down to force a powerful sweep past short fine for his 75th ODI fifty
tossed up on leg stump, worked to deep square, they decide not to attempt a second, wisely
skips out to a flighted one and slams it back to the bowler

Hyderabad cheers as Ambati Rayudu breaks the partnership in his first over, Dilshan charges out again and looks to go over extra cover, Ajinkya Rahane jumps and comes down with the ball safely in his grasp, only the second ODI wicket for Rayudu
worked down to long on with the slight spin
goes forward, takes it on the full and pushes down the ground
full on off and middle, pushed to midwicket
on the pads, Mahela waits, and uses the angle to softly turn it well out of the reach of short fine
Ashwin at short fine is finer now and stops a similar nudge from Mahela, also uproots off stump with the throw, the stump brushes Mahela, who is already in
pushed past midwicket's dive to wide long on
tossed up on off and middle, pushed down to long on
moves across to an offbreak and works it behind square
full and just down the leg side as Mahela misses, there is an appeal for a stumping, but the back foot was inside
leans forward, works it to square leg
85 kph and full on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
tossed up a bit fuller, nudged wide of midwicket
pops up in the air for a while as he turns it square off his pad
sweeps from just outside off, safely along the ground, down to long leg
skips out and hits a full toss to extra cover
quick and shortish, punched to long off
turned off middle to backward square
length ball at 86 kph, pushed to midwicket
tries the reverse sweep this time, hits it to cover
length ball softly tapped near the pitch on the leg side
would have been a wide down leg had Mahela not played it, Raina dives to his right at short fine to stop it
full ball driven to mid off
length ball on middle and leg, worked to long leg
tossed up full on middle and leg, he takes a step out to push to long on
closes the face on a full ball to work it to deep square leg
pushed down the ground for a single
tapped square on the leg side
straightish and quick, worked to square leg
he's belted this reverse sweep right in the gap between point and short third man, went forward to a length delivery on off and swung hard
pushed down to long on for one
takes it from off and turns it in front of square, deep square leg runs in and keeps them to one
four first ball of the Powerplay, he stayed in the crease to a flat and quick ball angled in to leg stump, and Mahela bent to help it past short  fine
hurled in quicker and way down the leg side
tapped to short fine leg for a single
uh oh, Angelo's top edged a pull to mid off, short and angled in quick, Angelo went hard at the pull, only to sky it for Kohli to trot in and take a simple catch
punches a short one through cover
on the front foot to defend a tossed up ball
straightening on middle, Mahela turns it in front of midwicket, they are slow in going for the run, direct hit would have had Mahela, but he's just made it in, by the time Akshar takes the bails off
moves forward to a tossed up offbreak but finds midwicket as he closes the face
whips harder this time but cannot beat Kohli at midwicket
quick and full into the pad, nudged to short fine leg
works a full offbreak from outside off down to long on
slightly late in getting bat down on an offbreak, but manages ti tap it to midwicket
walks out and pushes for a single to long on
skips out and pushes it away off the pad
pushes off a thick edge along the ground to wide slip
comes out again, but the length is just not there to get underneath, defends again
has some width and cuts hard, straight to point

Yadav has taken a sharp catch at mid on, another one goes in the Powerplay, Priyanjan wanted to clear mid on as he bent and swung hard, did not get hold of a quick and full delivery, and Yadav dived to his left to take it
punched from the crease to midwicket
turned down to long on for a single
scythes this from off stump to cover, direct hit would have had him
appeal for lbw turned down as Mahela misses the work to leg, was hit over the knee roll in line with off
slogs and clears midwicket, but there is protection in the deep
97 kph length ball punched off the back foot to extra cover
not in control as he slogs along the ground to midwicket
bends and swings a full one with the angle through square leg
91.8 kph length ball slanted across the left hander, who misses the cut
pushed down to long on for one
nudged in front of midwicket for a quick single, there is a direct hit as Yadav sprints in, but Mahela has made it comfortably

it is coming apart for Sri Lanka, and Mahela can only watch from the other end, de Silva has made some room to one tossed up on leg to try and loft over extra cover, he's mishit it badly, and extra cover has settled under it
turned off the pad to midwicket
moves forward and nudges an offbreak to leg
waits for it to arrive outside off and dabs it to short third man
90.1 kph and angled in to the left hander, pushed to mid on
pushes forward to an offbreak and takes a single to cover
that stayed low at 96 kph, there was a shout for lbw, but after an inside edge
Mahela survives another run out chance after turning it behind square leg, there have been a few against him today, has to dive this time as Ashwin  helps the throw on to the stumps
bouncing from a length, he turns it square from the crease
Sri Lanka going down in a heap here, Thisara now, was trying to work this short of a length delivery off his pads, closed the face sooner than needed, and the leading edge popped up to extra cover
short of a length around off, tapped close to the pitch
beaten as he pushes at a back of a length ball outside off
dropped by Raina to his left at slip, Prasanna pushing away from the body at a pitched up ball, Raina did not get down early enough, that was a takeable chance
meanwhile, in seemingly another game, Mahela wills his way to another boundary, timing one past point and beating third man on the run
chops a cut to point
pushes softly in front of cover for a single
on the stumps, pushed back down the track
full now, patted back to the bowler
quick and wide, forced to cover
tossed up ball coming in with the angle, he carefully pushes it back
shortish, angled in to the pad, Mahela knows fine leg is up, and he just helps it wristily over the fielder
calm forward defence to cover off this length ball
gets on top of the bounce and drags a pull to deep square, turns down the single, he's had enough of wickets falling
poor ball, high full toss down the pads, and Mahela puts it away fine, it is called a no-ball for height, was just above waist height
length ball on off, turned to midwicket
slower one full outside off, he adjusts as he comes forward and runs it to point
keeps strike as he works a length ball down to long on
tossed up ball pushed to extra cover

deep midwicket is vacant, and Mahela Jayawardene has gone to his 17th ODI century, and his first one since July 2013 with a slog-sweep that just clears the rope, he's had to turn down singles already, but he's soldiered on with typical finesse
takes two to deep square leg now
pushes a flighted ball to long off
leans forward to defend to the off side
goes after a tossed up ball outside off, mistimes it towards the bowler
tries to paddle a full ball off the pad, but misses, and Kulkarni gets away yet again with a poor line today
sends it full and down the leg side now
full toss down the leg side, helped along to the fine leg boundary, and Kulkarni has overstepped as well according to the umpire, tight call, but free hit coming up
makes room outside leg to a full ball on the stumps and steers it to point
pushes it past the non-striker and they have two more by the time long on runs around
bouncer climbing high, Prasanna misses the hook
Kulkarni tries the slower bouncer, but it has gained too much height as is called wide
crisp drive off the front foot but straight to extra cover as Kulkarni's over finally ends
full on the pads, Mahela's wrists send it flying to deep square, he is disappointed at not putting that in the gap
Rayudu sprints in from deep square leg, but he cannot reach this top-edged hook in time, takes it on the bounce
full toss down the leg side, Mahela misses, and Yadav escapes with minimum damage
walks across outside off as Yadav digs it in short, and misses
makes room outside leg and steers to short third man, who misses at the non-striker's end with Prasann scrambling back
offers width outside off on this slower length ball and Mahela sends it zooming past cover with a sharp cut
another one sent down the leg side, this field is putting too much strain on the bowlers
could have been four more but Mahela did not get hold of this full delivery on the pads, it rolled slowly past Saha's dive
moves forward to a full ball and takes a single to long on
slaps a widish offbreak to extra cover
shorter this time outside off, and Prasanna leans back to flat-bat it hard, just over the wide long off rope
fired in full into the pad, turned to short fine leg
straighter one, thick edge to short third man, but they are able to pinch a single as Akshar decides which end to go to
Mahela moves to 12,000 ODI runs with a push off a straighter one to cover, fifth man and third Sri Lankan to do it
guides a wide yorker behind point and Raina does well to stop the boundary as he runs and sprawls across from third man
almost another yorker outside off, squeezed to extra cover
very full and not easy to get under again, dug out to extra cover
Raina has more running to do at third man as Prasanna steers a wide yorker to his right, almost gets past him as he dives but he keeps it in
full toss, Prasanna cranks up and hammers it past mid off's dive, gets a pat on the helmet from Mahela, the partnership is worth 61 now
Kulkarni tries the slower bouncer, Prasanna hooks, right in the gap between deep square and fine leg for four more, making India pay more and more for that dropped catch
tapped down to wide long on for a single
92.3 kph and straightish outside off, pushed to cover

Ashwin's first wicket is the one India wanted the most, Mahela on the charge, Ashwin tosses it up a touch wider outside off, Mahela swings and misses, Saha does not, and Mahela has to walk back after an outstanding innings, he is disgusted with himself for missing the ball
pushes a tossed up ball to point
carom ball defended off the front foot
moves forward and drives to mid off
low full toss from round the stumps, worked to long leg
full on middle and leg, punched past midwicket
full toss turned through midwicket
worked to square leg for a single
full again on the pad, turned to long leg
full and down the leg side as India's wide count continues to increase
low full toss on the pad, rolls away to square leg
drives one slanted across to extra cover, who runs in but fails to pick up the ball to test the batsmen
tries to slog a slower length ball but cannot get hold of it
flicked off the pad down to fine leg
another one sent down the leg side
misses as he has a swipe at a low full toss, and Yadav hits the base of off stump for his first four-for in ODIs
bouncing from a length outside off, left alone
pushed down the track
pops up in the air to vacant short leg, Saha runs forward, takes it, and even back flicks it towards the stumps
hit down to long on
lunges forward again to defend to the bowler
tossed up ball defended off the front foot
on the front foot again to block
way down the leg side from round the stumps
would have been another wide had he not reached out to send it down to fine leg

Kulkarni gets a wicket, his first in ODIs. Kulasekara looks to clear the wide long on boundary off this full delivery, Rahane is on the run from long on, keeps his eyes on the ball and takes it calmly

inn2.comm: moves forward to a pitched up widish delivery and pushes to extra cover
comes in a tad from wide outside off, he lets it go
thick outside edge to third man as Rahane pushes at a full and wide one
leans forward, opens the face, and eases a length ball to extra cover
lovely, slanted across on a length from Kulasekara, and Dhawan leans into the line to split the gap between extra cover and mid off
whips it off the pad now, but cannot get it past midwicket
moves in from just back of a length and falls onto the pitch off thigh pad, and an inside edge before that
punched from the crease but cannot time it as it comes in
right on top of this good length ball to defend to covers
Rahane escapes with a thick inside edge on the drive, and the inswinger runs fine to the boundary
walks out and across this time and turns a length ball to long leg
angled across not far from off, Dhawan leaves calmly
opens the face as he steps forward and runs a length ball to covers
carries straight past outside off as he lets it go, and swings away as it approaches the keeper
moves across on the crease to push a good length ball to extra cover
walks out as Kulasekara angles it into the pad, and picks up a single to long leg
whips a short of a length ball between mdwicket and mid on for one
drills a drive to mid off as he moves forward nicely
angled across the left hander on a good length, leaves him further in the air. left alone
drives this time but ends up hitting it back to the bowler with a slightly closed face
steps down the track, stops and forces a short of a length ball past cover
pitches it up for the drive just outside off, Dhawan lifts his bat high instead to let it pass
similar line on the length ball and Dhawan leaves again

strange shot in the end, and he could have easily spooned it straight back to the bowler, Dhawan was on the walk across and the bowler followed him with a pitched up ball, Dhawan ended up playing it in the air but out of the bowler's reach, past the non-striker, and will pick up four for the effort
he got hold of this drive properly, but placed it straight to extra cover
on the walk, opens the face and guides the length ball to square third man
well run, Dhawan forced this punch from the middle stump line, and even as extra cover charged in, he judged the single superbly
that has come in sharply in the air and off the pitch, Rahane hit on the pad, but he is too much outside the pitch
again he leaves the crease, and eases a full ball to mid off for a single
moves forward to a 123 kph length ball and drives to mid on
that has slipped down the leg side as Gamage angles it in, and keeper's dive is in vain as it swings further away from him
moves down and across to clip with the inward movement to midwicket
he is looking to move out constantly but gets too close to this length ball and pushes to mid off
he'll have the boundary, but this is a charge and a heave, and the short ball could have gone anywhere, luckily for Rahane, it flies over slip
he was surprised by this short ball on the walk but controlled the hook alright in the end, past square leg
thick inside edge to midwicket as he pushes at an inswinger, Rahane looking quite tentative
leans forward and defends to the bowler
Dhawan on the charge now, gets a short ball, and swings it down to long leg
in total control this time as he leans forward and drives between extra cover and mid off with a flowing followthrough
moves across and defends a good length ball
sharp bouncer now, Rahane crouches
cramped as this length ball is angled in, and plays it out to  mid on
ending right on off stump from good length, he bends forward to defend
stands in the crease and pushes a back of a length ball to the bowler, more a waft than a punch
just outside off with the line, Dhawan forward to push it to mid off, looks for the single, it is not there
he's taken a step across early, and lifted this shortish ball over midwicket, front foot in the air as he does so, but all he needs to do is clear the infield
almost hit it to mid off, drove it on the charge, to the fielder on the bounce
uses the angle into him on this length ball to tuck it through square leg
on the front foot to push a length ball to mid off
appeal for leg before first up as he misses a full ball on the front foot, but that was sliding down
takes a thick inside edge now as he pushes forward for a single to short fine leg
bowled full on middle and leg, turned to wide long on
drives an overpitched ball but extra cover moves to his left to stop it
tossed up again, and Rahane drives once more, cannot clear the offside field
on the third attempt, he splits the gap between cover and short extra cover, opening the face slightly on the drive
controls the short ball well as he pulls along the ground to deep square leg
short and wide at 132 kph, and Rahane has clobbered that to the deep point rope
almost another one, this was shorter and wide, Rahane cut it in the air, but third man keeps it in with a dive
turned off the pad in front of square
steps forward to one bouncing from around good length and pushes to cover
right on off stump line with a slightly fuller length, defended neatly
flighted full toss but Dhawan fails to push it past midwicket
tosses it up high and full, Rahane drives off the inner part of the bat, to the bowler
looks to step out, then sees the trajectory is flatter and the length shorter, and rocks back quickly to cut, they go for two, and he has to dive in
leans forward to defend a flighted one on middle and leg
Rahane charges for the single after a push to extra cover, but has to turn back quickly
lots of flight, and he uncertainly pushes forward to defend off a thick inside edge
taps a short of a length ball in front of cover and the sharp single is safely taken
wants to dab this shortish ball past slip, but misses
pitches it up on off, Rahane is a touch late in getting forward but pushes it to mid off
charges out, has a swing, and the bouncer whizzes past his shoulder
another bouncer, just over Rahane's head as he hops and crouches a bit

Rahane has been bounced out, this was just outside off this time, and climbing quickly and steeply, Rahane tried to cut it, he was on the hop and late on the shot as it pinged the glove and popped up to slip
moves forward and works a full one to long on
pushed to the bowler
walks out and squeezes a tossed up ball to the bowler
this was quicker and not turning much, Sri Lanka appeal for lbw, but there was an inside edge
gets a stride forward and defends to extra cover
gets on top of a short ball outside off and guides it to third man
short again from Perera, but some way outside off, and Rayudu lets it go
short once more, closer to off, Rayudu thinks about going after it, sees it climbing high and sways away

bouncer right in front of the helmet, Rayudu hooks, and Kulasekara might have lost it in the lights for a bit, he could have tried coming in more for the catch, takes it on the bounce in the end, but it was a no ball as Perera has bowled too many bouncers for the over
opens the face and runs a bouncing length ball to third man
shortish and wide, slapped away to the sweeper
follows this legbreak from the crease and pushes it past extra cover, down to long of
tossed up but down the leg side, and Dhawan drags a sweep wide of deep square
down the track to a flighted one and drives it past the bowler's dive
flat and sliding across, he makes room and slaps it to the sweeper
on the walk to reach the pitch and push for a single to long off
Perera continuing with the bouncer ploy, good line close to off stump, Rayudu keeps the bat down and sways inside the line
moves back and across and guides a short of a length ball to third man
short ball pulled away with control to deep midwicket
he's moved across and pulled the short ball, one leg in the air, out to deep square leg
another bouncer at 134.1 kph, just outside off, Rayudu lets it pass
pushes for a single down to long on
gets forward and keeps a bouncing legbreak down
leaves the crease and drives it out to the sweeper
takes it from around middle and nudges it behind square
skips out to a flighted ball, he is nearly done in, but adjusts to clip it to midwicket
rolls the wrists over this pull as he sends the short ball to deep square leg
bouncer gets up steeply at Dhawan, he drags it into the ground to pick up a single to square leg
Rayudu finds himself in an awkward position as he walks across to a bouncer, is in the air, and fending, but there is no short leg
pushes a short of a length ball to point
Perera continues banging it in, Dhawan pulls it out to deep midwicket
goes across to a length ball straightening on off and pushes it to extra cover
drives off the front foot to the sweeper
full one worked off the pad to deep midwicket
86.3 kph delivery with slight turn, Rayudu forward to block
wider and fuller, he drives to sweeper cover
he starts with a short ball from round the stumps, Rayudu crouches
bouncer again, but leg sidish as Rayudu walks outside the line
third time short on the trot, shorter in fact, and another wide called
the angle has changed, but the length is still short, Rayudu has to move inside the line now to avoid it
short of a length ball, he moves across and punches it to mid on
could have played on as he got too close back in the crease to the line of a length ball, chopped it just past the stumps
Sri Lanka almost break through Rayudu's patience, he charges out and has a heave at an offcutter, the edge flies over slip, and falls well short of third man
beaten as he pushes with an open face at a short of a length ball slanted across
works a length ball against the turn to midwicket
well executed in the end, goes deep in the crease, and takes this almost from off stump and runs it wide of short third man
pitched up ball driven down to long off
skips out, gets close to the pitch and pushes to long on
Rayudu leaves the crease too and stretches to push this to cover
chance for a run out as they go for the single on this punch to cover, but the throw misses, direct hit would have been tight
short of a length, pushed away from off stump line, extra cover runs in to prevent the single
slower one on middle, turned to deep midwicket
stays on the crease to a pitched up ball and pushes it away
was expecting the short ball as he walked across and swung at it, but one hand comes off the bat handle as he drags it through midwicket
short and angled in, following the batsman as he makes room, lets it go in the end
makes some room to cut, it goes past backward point but Priyanjan stops the boundary in the deep, Dhawan has reached 2000 ODI runs, and he is the quickest Indian to the mark
and now he has reached fifty with a skip down the track, takes it on the full and lofts it over the deep midwicket rope
Rayudu now, what a strike, down the track, to the pitch and scythes it past extra cover's dive, no chance for the sweeper
opens the face as he steps forward and picks up a single through cover
reverse sweep now, he's taken that from outside leg stump, and hit it to deep backward point
slow bouncer, Dhawan waits for it, and controls it down to long leg
comes out but Mathews cramps him with an angled back of a length ball, he runs to pick up the ball and tries to flick it towards the stumps, sends it onto the pitch and gifts them a single
punched from the crease to the sweeper
drags the pull into the ground, to deep midwicket
bouncer from round the stumps, Rayudu walks across and lets it go
yet another short ball, angled in, Rayudu thinks about the pull, resists, the ball slips just down leg, Mathews is not happy with the wide call
this will go, Rayudu in position to play the pull, gets right on top of the bounce, and sends it into the unmanned deep midwicket boundary
punched off the back foot to the sweeper
pushes an overpitched ball towards the non-striker, Dilshan goes flying to his right to stop it

this is the easiest of run-outs, and Rayudu is the one walking back, he was done in the flight as he skipped out, but adjusted to squeeze it to mid off, called and kept running with the momentum, Dhawan had his eyes on the ball and held out a hand to Rayudu, who did not stop till he had passed the other end, the ball arrived to the keeper, while Dhawan and Rayudu were still remonstrating
nudged behind square on leg
driven off the front foot to long off
moves across and blocks a length ball on off
on off and middle now, good length, Kohli pushes to mid on
Kohli won't hold back against the short ball, and he almost gets into trouble as he mishits the pull, but well short of mid on in the end
taps a length ball to mid off from the crease
short ball sitting up and pulled nicely through square leg, long leg runs around and dives to stop it
pitched up on the pad now, whipped behind square for a single
loud shout for lbw as Dhawan misses a sweep off a full delivery, an inside edge there
goes back to work it past midwicket
right forward to smother it down the track
makes room to a legbreak on middle and punches to midwicket
opens the face a touch as he steps forward to defend
stays back to a turning length ball and softly plays to point
and he is welcomed with a straight loft that goes just past his outstretched right hand, a chance that, difficult though
driven off the front foot to mid off for one
captain Kohli with one of his trademark strokes, takes this length ball from off stump, leans across, and whips it to the deep midwicket rope
reaches for this widish length ball to push to point
lovely, to the left of mid on this time, overpitched from Gamage, Kohli steps forward, closes the face slightly and drives it with superb timing
tapped towards point from the crease
down the track to take it on the full and push to deep midwicket
drives off the front foot to the sweeper
out of the crease again, not to the pitch exactly, but adjusts to turn it through square leg
in the air but safely and quickly past slip as Kohli cuts a bouncing legbreak hard
stretches forward to smother a tossed up ball
closes the face a tad as he comes forward to one on middle and leg, and that is why he can pick up a single square on the leg side
taps a length ball between midwicket and mid on
Dhawan is in the air as he reaches for a short ball outside off and thumps it along the ground to deep midwicket
turns a length ball on off to midwicket
solidly forward to push to extra cover
short of a length, he moves across to tuck it to midwicket
punches a good length ball to cover
worked off the pad behind square
turned to midwicket
Kohli picks up the length and rocks back early to pull high from middle stump line, that was initially called a six, but it has bounced well inside the deep midwicket rope
goes back to a fuller and quicker one but is able to nudge it behind square
tapped behind square yet again, and with only short leg around, it is another easy couple of runs
forward to push to the bowler
stands tall in the crease to push a length ball to sweeper cover
a stinging drive is half stopped at short extra cover but they are able to pinch a single
short ball sitting up at 130.9 kph and Dhawan cracks the pull, it was in line to be stopped at deep midwicket with a dive, but it slipped past and rolled into the boundary
well judged single again, Dhawan pushes past the non-striker, knowing that extra cover won;t be able to get to it in time
taps a good length ball slanted across from round the stumps, to cover
makes some room to this full toss and places it in the gap between extra cover and mid off with an open faced drive
skips out, nearly yorks himself with this tossed up ball, forces it to mid off in the end
Kohli reaches a tossed up widish ball and slaps a drive to extra cover
out of nowhere, he's cranked up and slogged this full delivery for six over deep midwicket
shortish and wide, cut to deep point for a single
length ball turned in front of square off the pad
Dhawan charges out first ball after the drinks break, and slams it way over the bowler
short and wide, cut neatly too, but stopped equally well by de Silva at point
he's middling everything now, this drive flies on the bounce and pops out of short extra cover's hands
slowish bouncer, Kohli swivels and controls a pull down to long leg
full toss on the pad, worked wide of fine leg

Dhawan's been given caught behind in a late decision by umpire Kulkarni, Sangakkara went up right away as Dhawan tried to hook this bouncer and withdrew late, replays show it has brushed the helmet, and missed the bat, that was a sharp short ball from Kulasekara, to give him his first wicket in his last eight ODIs
right behind the line of this short of a length ball to block
Kohli has furiously slammed this short ball from outside off, and it needs a dive at deep midwicket to save the boundary
short of a length, tucked behind square off the pad
another bouncer, pulled with control to deep midwicket
leans forward and turns it through vacant midwicket off the pad
Raina wants to pull this short ball through square leg, he's closed the stance too early and the ball has somehow popped up and fallen down close to the crease
pulled behind square leg, fielder in the deep dives and prevents the boundary
solid defence to midwicket from the crease
back of a length around off, turned to deep square leg
Raina able to pull this time, to deep square leg
yet another short ball, yet another pull, to deep square leg
fine straight push by Raina as he leans forward
clips it well off the pad, to midwicket, fielder was going to his right initially, the ball arrived to his left, but he scrambled to stop it
slower back of a length ball worked to deep square leg
in total control as he hits a pull into the ground behind square
chance for a catch goes, Raina pushed in the air, Kula stretched out his left hand, it brushed his fingers and went to mid on
defends a good length ball on the stumps
short ball down the leg side, Raina has a go at it, only manages to under edge it on the bounce to the keeper
goes back to a fullish ball and punches to the bowler
shortish this time, wide too, but his cut goes to the sweeper
bat in front of pad as he comes forward to defend
tries a sweep, it rolls behind square off the pad
taps a legbreak closer to off, to point
whips a drive off an overpitched ball to the bowler
leans forward to a tossed up ball and pushes for a single past the bowler
punched off the back foot to long off
worked off the pad behind square
Kohli becomes the quickest man to 6000 ODI runs and also gets to fifty with a tuck square on the leg side, takes off the helmet and kisses it, and also blows a kiss off to someone off his bat
Raina down the track, and back leg in the air as he powers this over the wide long on boundary
wants the single with a tuck to midwicket but is sent back
pushed to midwicket off the back foot
turns it with the spin to square leg
eased with the turn to long on for one
stays a touch low around off, Raina punches it to deep point off the back foot
solid push off the front foot to mid off
angled in to leg, pushed to the bowler
defended off the front foot to extra cover
punched from the crease to the sweeper
this stayed low but Kohli latched on to the pull nevertheless as he opened his stance, and that was hit so hard it burst through midwicket;s hands
dabbed softly to short third man
worked off the pad in front of square
down the track, gets too close to the pitch, and slams it to the bowler
makes some room, but is still cramped with the turn and pushes to the bowler
hit with the spin to midwicket
Kohli's holed out to long on as he looked to equal the scores with an attempted six, took a couple of steps out, made some room to a shortish ball and heaved it straight to long on
driven nicely off the front foot to the sweeper
swept with the inward angle, but short fine leg's dive saves the boundary
whips a drive off a tossed up ball to the bowler
moves across and nudges square on the leg side
goes back to a quicker one and works it to midwicket
tries to paddle this one but misses
misses as he tries to punch now, Sanga cannot collect too
turns it to square leg off the pad
wide ball flashed wide of the sweeper for a couple
pushed from the crease to point
leans on the front foot to push to covers
tries to paddle a full ball angled in, misses, and the shout for leg before is turned down as well, that was easily missing leg
Dilshan makes it turn away from the right hander and Saha is beaten as he pushes at it
a tossed up high full toss hit to the left of the sweeper
Saha launches it over mid on to finally take India home after the late quiet period
